description.title: Description

plan_focus.title: Plan Focus
plan_focus.content: Plans should focus on WHAT and WHY, not HOW. Implementation details belong in separate implementation guides.

avoid_in_plans.title: Avoid in Plans
avoid_in_plans.content:
- Detailed code snippets
- Step-by-step implementation instructions
- Exact file contents
- Specific function implementations
- Detailed API specifications

include_in_plans.title: Include in Plans
include_in_plans.content:
- Overall approach and strategy
- Key architectural decisions
- High-level requirements
- Success criteria
- Risk assessment
- Integration points
